description: Need a replacement blade for the Ultra Accel Professional Folding Saw? This blade has a large/coarse tooth configuration (6.4 tpi) designed for use with green wood.Tooth layout (6.4 teeth per inch) is designed for pruning and green wood.Proprietary Silky Smooth Cutting Technology (MIRAI-ME) slices through wood in a flash.Rust-resistant, hard chrome-plated, taper-ground blade with an impulse-hardened non-set tooth design offers greater cutting efficiency.
name: Silky Ultra Accel Replacement Blade
